data.eml:eml: Bolbitis lianhuachihensis (Dryopteridaceae), a new species from Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chao, Yi-Shan, Huang, Yu-Fang, Dong, Shi-Yong, Huang, Yao-Moan, Liu, Ho-Yih (2019): Bolbitis lianhuachihensis (Dryopteridaceae), a new species from Taiwan. PhytoKeys 131: 69-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.131.36548, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.131.36548
